[![GIVD](badges/givd-sudamerica.svg)](http://www.givd.info/ID/SA-CL-001)

```{r import_sudamerica, echo=FALSE, results="hide"}
load("data/sudamerica_plots.rda")
```

A database for vegetation-plot records in South America.

This database is currently including
**`r format(nrow(sudamerica_plots), big.mark=",")`** plot observations.

```{r map_sudamerica, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
leaflet(sudamerica_plots) %>% addTiles() %>%
		addCircleMarkers(lng=~longitude, lat=~latitude, color="red",
				opacity=0.3, radius=1)
```
